definitions.title: n. pr. m.
definitions.body: (servant of Yah, cf. Gray:Prop. N. 295, No. 90; also Ph. [[עבדבעל]], Palm. [[עבדבל]], OAram. [[עבדההד]] Lzb:333, OHeb. [[עבדיהו]] Id.:334);—I. [[עׂבַדְיׇ֫הוּ]]:
chief of Ahab's household 1Ki 18:3, 1Ki 18:3, 1Ki 18:4, 1Ki 18:5, 1Ki 18:6, 1Ki 18:7, 1Ki 18:16, LXX Abd(e)iou.
father of one of the chiefs of Zebulun 1Ch 27:19, LXX Abd(e)iou (genit.).
a Levite overseer in time of Josiah 2Ch 34:12, LXX Abd(e)ia, A LXXL Abdiav. II. [[עׂבַדְיׇה]]:
the prophet Ob:Ob 1, LXX Obd(e)iou (genit.), Abd(e)iou.
a descendant of David 1Ch 3:21, LXX Abdeia, LXXL Obdiav.
chief of tribe of Issachar 1Ch 7:3, LXX Meibdeia, A Obdia, LXXL Abdia.
a Benjamite 1Ch 8:38, 1Ch 9:44, LXX Abd(e)ia.
a Levite 1Ch 9:16 (‖[[עַבְדָּא]] Ne 11:17), LXX Abdeia A Obdia , LXXL Abia.
a Gadite chief 1Ch 12:9, LXX Abd(e)ia.
a prince in time of Jehoshaphat 2Ch 17:7, LXX Ab(d)ian.
priestly companion of Ezra Ezr 8:9, Ne 10:6, LXX Adeia, Ab(a)d(e)ia, LXXL Abdiou, Abiav.
a doorkeeper Ne 12:25, [[א]] Obdiav, LXXL Abdiav.
